column4: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ At 7:10 am on 10 May 2020
column9: an accident left a Chinese man dead.------The Chinese victim was riding a Honda motorcycle
column10: when two men on another motorcycle crashed into him. *------EDIT: the original source said the pair were bag snatchers
column11: other sources don’t mention this. ------UPDATE: The Chinese man was named as Fei Shiqi
column13: from Shanghai.------One of the suspects was injured were taken to hospital and another escaped. ------POST NEWS
